trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Undo-Transaction
trans-unit.target: Undo-Transaction

trans-unit.source: Undo-Transaction
trans-unit.target: Undo-Transaction

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Rolls back the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 回滚活动事务。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The Undo-Transaction cmdlet rolls back the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: Undo-Transaction cmdlet 回滚活动事务。

trans-unit.source: When you roll back a transaction, the changes made by the commands in the transaction are discarded and the data is restored to its original form.
trans-unit.target: 回滚事务时，由事务中的命令所做的更改将被丢弃，数据将还原到其原始形式。

trans-unit.source: If the transaction includes multiple subscribers, an Undo-Transaction command rolls back the entire transaction for all subscribers.
trans-unit.target: 如果事务包含多个订阅者，则 Undo-Transaction 命令将为所有订阅者回滚整个事务。

trans-unit.source: By default, transactions are rolled back automatically if any command in the transaction generates an error.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，如果事务中的任何命令发生错误，事务都会自动回滚。

trans-unit.source: However, transactions can be started with a different rollback preference and you can use this cmdlet to roll back the active transaction at any time.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可以使用不同的回滚首选项启动事务，并且你可以使用此 cmdlet 随时回滚活动事务。

trans-unit.source: The Undo-Transaction cmdlet is one of a set of cmdlets that support the transactions feature in Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: Undo-Transaction cmdlet 是 Windows PowerShell 中支持事务功能的一组 cmdlet 之一。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Transactions.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Transactions。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: This command rolls back the current (active) transaction.
trans-unit.target: 此命令回滚当前（活动）事务。

trans-unit.source: This command starts a transaction and then rolls it back.
trans-unit.target: 此命令先启动一项事务，然后回滚它。

trans-unit.source: As a result, no changes are made to the registry.
trans-unit.target: 因此未对注册表进行更改。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates that when any subscriber rolls back a transaction, the entire transaction is rolled back for all subscribers.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示了当任何订阅者回滚事务时，将为所有订阅者回滚整个事务。

trans-unit.source: The first command changes the location to the HKCU:\Software registry key.
trans-unit.target: 第一条命令将位置更改为 HKCU:\Software 注册表项。

trans-unit.source: The second command starts a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 第二条命令启动事务。

trans-unit.source: The third command uses the New-Item cmdlet to create a new registry key.
trans-unit.target: 第三条命令使用 New-Item cmdlet 创建新的注册表项。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the UseTransaction parameter to include the change in the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用 UseTransaction 参数包含在该事务中所做的更改。

trans-unit.source: The fourth command uses the Get-Transaction cmdlet to get the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 第四条命令使用 Get-Transaction cmdlet 获取活动事务。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the status is Active and the subscriber count is 1.
trans-unit.target: 你会看到状态为 Active，订阅者计数为 1。

trans-unit.source: The fifth command uses the Start-Transaction command again.
trans-unit.target: 第五条命令同样使用 Start-Transaction 命令。

trans-unit.source: Typically, starting a transaction while another transaction is in progress occurs when a script used by the main transaction includes its own complete transaction.
trans-unit.target: 通常，如果主事务使用的脚本包含其自己的完整事务，则会在某一事务正在执行期间启动另一个事务。

trans-unit.source: (This example is done interactively so that you can examine it in stages.) When you enter a Start-Transaction command while another transaction is in progress, the commands join the existing transaction as a new "subscriber" and the subscriber count is incremented.
trans-unit.target: （此示例以交互方式执行，以便你可以分阶段检查。）如果在另一个事务正在执行时输入 Start-Transaction 命令，该命令将作为新的“订阅者”加入现有事务，并且订阅者计数将会递增。

trans-unit.source: The sixth command uses the Get-Transaction cmdlet to get the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 第六条命令使用 Get-Transaction cmdlet 获取活动事务。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the subscriber count is now 2.
trans-unit.target: 你会看到此时订阅者计数为 2。

trans-unit.source: The seventh command uses the Undo-Transaction cmdlet to roll back the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 第七条命令使用 Undo-Transaction cmdlet 回滚事务。

trans-unit.source: This command does not return any objects.
trans-unit.target: 此命令不返回任何对象。

trans-unit.source: The final command is a Get-Transaction command that gets the active (or in this case, the most recently active) transaction.
trans-unit.target: 最后一条命令是获取活动事务（在本例中为最近活动的事务）的 Get-Transaction 命令。

trans-unit.source: The results show that the transaction is rolled back, and that the subscriber count is 0, showing that the transaction was rolled back for all subscribers.
trans-unit.target: 结果显示事务已回滚并且订阅者计数为 0，这表明已为所有订阅者回滚事务。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 显示如果运行 cmdlet 则会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 不会运行。显示在 cmdlet 运行时，会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: cmdlet 未运行。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe input to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 不能通过管道将输入传递给此 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not return any output.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 不返回任何输出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: You cannot roll back a transaction that has been committed.
trans-unit.target: 不能回滚已提交的事务。

trans-unit.source: You cannot roll back any transaction other than the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 不能回滚活动事务之外的任何事务。

trans-unit.source: To roll back a different, independent transaction, you must first commit or roll back the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 若要回滚其他独立事务，则必须先提交或回滚活动事务。

trans-unit.source: Rolling back the transaction ends the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 回滚事务将会终止该事务。

trans-unit.source: To use a transaction again, you must start a new transaction.
trans-unit.target: 若要再次使用事务，则必须启动新事务。
